alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Gulf; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 4:09PM EST until January 12 at 4:45PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Gulf County in the Panhandle of Florida... Southern Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida... Franklin County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 445 PM EST/345 PM CST/. * At 409 PM EST/309 PM CST/, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles northeast of Port St. Joe, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Carrabelle, Eastpoint, Apalachicola, Franklin, Carrabelle Beach, East Camp, Jewel Fire Tower, Royal Bluff, Vilas, Eleven Mile, Odena, Central City, Beverly, Poplar Camp, Kern, Bay City, Willis Landing, Apalachicola Airport, Twin Pole and Hays Place. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
